name: Reverse Polarity
description:
This is Reverse Polarity, a casual platformer about forces.  Let me know what you think!

Designed to be played with an Xbox controller, but there is keyboard support as well.

Controller: use A to jump, LS to roll, and the triggers to change your polarity.

Keyboard:  use spacebar to jump, A/D to roll (+shift to roll slow), and the arrow keys to change your polarity.
